descriptionNullable:
### The dataset includes 2974 images.
### Fruits are annotated in Multi-Class Classification format.

### The following pre-processing was applied to each image:
* Auto-orientation of pixel data (with EXIF-orientation stripping)
* Resize to 640x640 (Stretch)

### The following augmentation was applied to create 3 versions of each source image:
* 50% probability of horizontal flip
* 50% probability of vertical flip
* Random rotation of between -15 and +15 degrees
* Random shear of between -15° to +15° horizontally and -15° to +15° vertically
* Random Gaussian blur of between 0 and 3.5 pixels

![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F10074224%2F162c55d2565ae2bcd3582afb55604d9a%2F1.png?generation=1702035687994256&alt=media)
title: Fruits by YOLO - Fruits Detection
subtitle: Fruits by YOLO Image Dataset
description:
### The dataset includes 2974 images.
### Fruits are annotated in Multi-Class Classification format.

### The following pre-processing was applied to each image:
* Auto-orientation of pixel data (with EXIF-orientation stripping)
* Resize to 640x640 (Stretch)

### The following augmentation was applied to create 3 versions of each source image:
* 50% probability of horizontal flip
* 50% probability of vertical flip
* Random rotation of between -15 and +15 degrees
* Random shear of between -15° to +15° horizontally and -15° to +15° vertically
* Random Gaussian blur of between 0 and 3.5 pixels
